short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search Everything on the web from modern start page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Customize your browsing experience, create offline notes, get current weather, etc. Our goal is to satisfy the most demanding users. We have developed the best modern gaming-style design for your new tab page. You will get aesthetic pleasure every day when you open your favorite browser.
This futuristic new tab page extension is a great choice if you love dark mode. It has 2 modes: dark and darker. However, you can upload your own background image with any brightness.

Please read carefully:
By installing the "Search Everything" extension you agree to install this app, and you agree to 
the Terms of use https://searchse.com/eula.html
and the Privacy Policy https://searchse.com/privacy.html

Note: this extension takes over your new tab search engine. We may change your search engine on new tab page if we decide it would be better for you. If you are not happy with this change, you can stop using the search on this page.

Permissions: You must provide access to your approximate geographic location so we can provide you with weather data based on your location. We will not use this data for any other purpose.
